subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Majestic Warrior and Ready’s Image, the 1-2 finishers in the Hopeful Stakes at Saratoga, will meet again today at Belmont Park in the 136th running of the Champagne Stakes, the oldest stakes race for 2-year-olds. The winner gains automatic entry into the $2 million Breeders’ Cup Juvenile on Oct. 27 at Monmouth Park. Majestic Warrior defeated Ready’s Image in the seven-furlong Hopeful.
